location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'File 5/27 Shaikh Sir Ahmad al Jabir of Kuwait'

physicalDescription.extent: This file is arranged approximately in chronological order.
Foliation: Circled in pencil, in the top right corner of each folio. It begins on the front cover, on number 1, and runs through to 7, ending on the inside of the back cover.

mods.abstract: This file contains correspondence between Charles Geoffrey Prior, British Political Agent at Bahrain; Hugh Vincent Biscoe, British Political Resident in the Persian Gulf at Bushire; and Trenchard Craven Fowle, Acting British Political Resident in the Persian Gulf at Bushire.These correspondence concern the personality of Shaikh Aḥmad al-Jābir Āl Ṣabāḥ and contain details regarding his ability to raise customs duty in Kuwait; his 1931 impromptu visit to Bahrain and his relations with Shaikh Ḥamad bin ‘Īsá Āl Khalīfah; and his desire to buy a property in Bahrain.

name.namePart: Shaikh Hakim of Kuwait Aḥmad al-Jābir Āl Ṣabāḥ
Shaikh Hakim of Bahrain Ḥamad bin 'Īsá Āl Khalīfah
